destination.name: Bangkok
destination.funFact: Bangkok is the capital and most populous city of Thailand.

destination.name: Paris
destination.funFact: Paris is known as the 'City of Light' and home to the Eiffel Tower.

destination.name: Tokyo
destination.funFact: Tokyo is the largest metropolitan area in the world.

destination.name: New York
destination.funFact: New York is nicknamed 'The Big Apple'.

destination.name: Cairo
destination.funFact: Cairo is near the Great Pyramids of Giza.

destination.name: Sydney
destination.funFact: Sydney is famous for its Opera House and Harbour Bridge.

destination.name: Rome
destination.funFact: Rome is home to the Colosseum and the Vatican City.

destination.name: Dubai
destination.funFact: Dubai is home to the tallest building in the world, Burj Khalifa.

destination.name: Rio de Janeiro
destination.funFact: Rio is famous for its Carnival festival and Christ the Redeemer statue.

destination.name: London
destination.funFact: London is home to the Big Ben and Buckingham Palace.
